title: Shards and Layer-2s: Unpacking NEAR and Ethereum’s contrasting approaches to blockchain scalability
description:
The landscape of blockchain scalability has evolved significantly in recent years, with Layer-2s (L2s) and sharding emerging as the two dominant approaches. Ethereum, a key player in the crypto industry, has adopted rollup-centric L2s to scale its network, while NEAR protocol has taken a different path, choosing to scale via sharding. Both strategies offer unique […]

The post Shards and Layer-2s: Unpacking NEAR and Ethereum’s contrasting approaches to blockchain scalability appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: ‘Bidenomics’ Agenda Struggles to Gain Support as Joe Biden’s Approval Ratings Plummet
description: Over the past week, U.S. president Joe Biden has been engaged in discussions regarding his economic agenda, commonly referred to as “Bidenomics,” with the aim of establishing a strong groundwork for his 2024 reelection campaign. title: Flow Coin Price Prediction 2023-2032: Is FLOW a Good Investment?
description: Seasoned traders go by the time-tested formula: invest most of your crypto portfolio in BTC (50%); 35% in a basket of big-cap coins, and the rest in small projects with huge upside. But for beginners, all cryptocurrencies are risky investments, so they must tread lightly and keep all their senses open in the crypto space. Let’s see what ... Read more

title: South Africa’s financial regulator to require licenses for crypto exchanges by year-end
description: The Financial Sector Conduct Authority (FSCA) of South Africa has made an announcement, stating that all cryptocurrency exchanges operating within the country must obtain licenses by the end of the year.

title: European Council Passes New Measures for Wealth Confiscation and Property Seizure: The End for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Crypto?
description: The European Council is introducing a new measure to monitor and confiscate “unexplained assets” The implication for cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum is brought into focus. Members of the European Council have finally agreed on the “Proposal for a Directive of the European Parliament and of the Council on asset recovery and confiscation” measure. This [...]

title: XRP Makes Waves in Gambling Industry: Shuffle Betting Platform Integrates XRP, Offers Raffle
description: XRP is making headway in different industries, including the gambling world. The cryptocurrency has just been integrated into Shuffle, a crypto-based online betting outfit. XRP has recently been integrated into Shuffle, a popular crypto-backed online betting platform. This integration is designed to empower users of Shuffle to make deposits of XRP on the platform through [...]
